name: Apple Container Skill
description: Enables agents to interact with the Apple Container CLI to manage containers, images, volumes, and networks on macOS.

name: PDF Skill
description: Tools for extracting text and data from PDF files.

name: DOCX Skill
description: Tools for reading and writing DOCX files.

name: PPTX Skill
description: Tools for reading and writing PPTX files.

name: XLSX Skill
description: Tools for reading and writing Excel (XLSX) files.

name: Skill Creator
description: A meta-skill for creating new Agent Skills.

name: Slack GIF Creator
description: A fun skill to create GIFs for Slack.

name: Template Skill
description: A template for creating new skills in the Anthropics ecosystem.
